channel.title: Comments on: Women Everywhere: The Success of WisCon
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Interview w/ Erin K Wagner on A.I., Being a Medievalist, and Centering Women Creators – Wyrm's Worlds
